caller_intent: Martin from Shellpoint Mortgage is attempting to reach Tracy at Alliance Insurance Services.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms caller's name and affiliation (Shellpoint Mortgage).
Agent sends a message to Tracy to notify her of the call.
Agent places Martin on hold to await Tracy's response.
knowledge_required: Internal communication protocols for notifying colleagues
Call handling procedures for transferring/holding callers
systems_referenced: Alliance Insurance customer portal (mentioned in hold music)
summary: Martin from Shellpoint Mortgage called to reach Tracy at Alliance Insurance. The agent sent a message to Tracy and placed Martin on hold. The call remains unresolved as Tracy has not yet responded.
